forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
